Uses of Class
alix.lucene.search.TopTerms

Packages that use TopTerms 
Package Description
alix.lucene.search
Objects to search and calculate lexical statistics from an index (ex: found occurrences by facet)
alix.lucene.util
Data structures used for indexing AND searching (ex: co-occurrences)

  • Uses of TopTerms in alix.lucene.search

    Methods in alix.lucene.search that return TopTerms 
    Modifier and Type Method Description
    TopTerms Facet.topTerms()
    Returns list of all facets in orthographic order
    TopTerms Facet.topTerms​(BitSet filter, TermList terms, Scorer scorer)
    Returns a dictionary of the terms of a facet, with scores and other stats
    TopTerms Freqs.topTerms()
    Return the global dictionary of terms for this field with some stats.
    TopTerms Freqs.topTerms​(BitSet filter)
    Count of occurrences by term for a subset of the index, defined as a BitSet.

  • Uses of TopTerms in alix.lucene.util

    Methods in alix.lucene.util that return TopTerms 
    Modifier and Type Method Description
    TopTerms Cooc.topTerms​(TermList terms, int left, int right, BitSet filter)
    Get cooccurrences fron a multi term query.
